page.title: 07TUNSTEAD C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: This school was built in 1881 and it has 7 classes. There are 10 teachers in our school but two of them only work part time. We are having a new school built which is nearly finished. It will be an open plan community school, but it will still be a Church of England School. This school is 104 years old, and we have discos, summer fairs and toy and book sales. My teacher is called Mr. Dean and my brother's is Miss Parnell. Our class is writing about the Normans. We have a football yard and the girls play rounders in the bottom yard, but our new school will have playing fields and it will also have a nursery. The Headteacher is called Mr. Martin and the vicar is called Mr. Ashworth.
